item.title: Starting My Postdoc in RPG at the University of Zurich
item.description: I am delighted to announce that I have started my postdoctoral position at the University of Zurich in the Robotics and Perception Group, under the supervision of Prof. Davide Scaramuzza. I am incredibly excited to contribute to cutting-edge research in robotics and perception and to collaborate with such an inspiring team.

item.title: I was accepted by RSS Pioneers Workshop 2025!
item.description: I am excited to share that I was selected

item.title: I have successfully defended my Ph.D.!
item.description: I am thrilled to share that I have successfully defended my Ph.D., huge thank to my supervisor Prof. Fu Zhang. Also great appreciate the committee member Prof. How for MIT, Prof. Mueller from UCB and Prof. Lu and the chair Prof. Deng.
